phrases: Dammit... l've got a bad feeling about this.
Who is going to play with me next?
I- it had no effect at all!
Chaozu will not be able to rest in peace like this!
Looks like his death was for nothing.
I am going to send you to meet him again in the Next World soon enough!
Y- you will pay for this!
You are definitely going to pay for this!
You cannot be too careful getting near him!
Get him back for Yamucha and Chaozu!
The only thing driving Tenshinhan is his determination.
He is fighting on determination alone.
What on earth is the problem!?
You should start seeing the Next World soon.
At this rate, Tenshinhan- san will be done in, too.
I have got to do something!
We have got a slight, momentary opening on him when he moves to attack.
We will watch for that moment.
I hope it goes well for you.
Are you sure you should be looking away?
But you will not be able to stand there
with that stupid look on your face once Son Goku arrives.
You just look forward to it.
Looks like this is the end of the line for you.
I will put you out of your misery right now.
I- I am sorry... Uncle Piccolo!
You really did a number on me.
You have shortened your lives even further.
I have decided to change the order in which I am going to kill you.
It looks like my life will only last a little longer.
Death... death is close at hand.
Which means... do not tell me!
Piccolo is going to be killed.
I still cannot sense his presence.
That was some awesome speed oni!
You guys are not too bright to be making me angry.
I will get you two together!
Well now, which one will I amuse myself with first?
I will leave the Namekian there alive, but barely breathing.
We have to find out more about the Dragon Balls from you.
They think that you are the only one who knows about the Dragon Balls.
They are planning to kill us all, in any case.
All right, we go on the offensive first!
We are going to attack him!
We do not need any cowards like you.
Go on home to bed, right now!
Is there anything we can do?
I did not think he was going to be this big a monster.
He goes far beyond the Saiyan that came earlier.
It is too late for regrets to do any good now!
I did not do any good.
And then I will be coming.
I will not let you be lonesome all by yourself!
This... this will be my final...
It did not work at all against him!
Do not tell me he is immortal!
He could have just lain there,
but he instead used up his power and died for nothing.
How can everyone be dying, one after another?
They have been saying that for a while.
Another one has been taken care of!
Let us go down on the ground and fight.
He is far more used to mid-air fighting than us.
It will all end up the same, no matter where it happens.
Why do not you let me get them?
There is something I want to ask them.
This Son Goku person you are talking about is Kakarrot, is not it?
To think that you are falling back on Kakarrot...
He could not even stand against Raditz.
What good will it do you when he gets here?
He will not be the same as he was back then!
He is sure to be much, much stronger!
Do not you look down your noses at Son Goku!
But for all that, he is not here, is he!?
Are you sure he has not gotten scared and run away!?
He is going to take care of you guys!
That reliance of yours is something else.
We are going to wait until he gets here.
Let us put these guys away right now!
We will not wait any longer than that.
I am going to play with them right now!
Did not you hear what I said!?
That is how it is going to be.
Your lives have been extended somewhat.
This is his first actual fight, after all.
I am the pathetic one for expecting anything from you.
Get out of here, you coward!
Be that as it may, the way that huge guy just got timid -
does that mean that Vegeta runt over there is even more ridiculously strong?
I am just itching to do something here!
Let us get them, right now!
and you will be able to watch a magnificent, hellish show.
What exactly will this hellish show in three hours be?
ls he saying that the extinction of earth will happen in three hours?
